mn124:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma bakulo rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
mn124:2.1: Atha kho acelakassapo ayasmato bakulassa puranagihisahayo yenayasma bakulo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata bakulena saddhim sammodi.
mn124:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho acelakassapo ayasmantam bakulam etadavoca:
mn124:3.3: “Imehi pana te, avuso bakula, asitiya vassehi katikkhattum methuno dhammo patisevito”ti?
mn124:3.4: “Na kho mam, avuso kassapa, evam pucchitabbam:
mn124:3.5: ‘imehi pana te, avuso bakula, asitiya vassehi katikkhattum methuno dhammo patisevito’ti.
mn124:3.6: Evanca kho mam, avuso kassapa, pucchitabbam:
mn124:3.7: ‘imehi pana te, avuso bakula, asitiya vassehi katikkhattum kamasanna uppannapubba’”ti?
mn124:3.9: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami kamasannam uppannapubbam”.
mn124:3.10: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati kamasannam uppannapubbam idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:4-5.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami byapadasannam …pe…
mn124:4-5.3: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati vihimsasannam uppannapubbam, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:6.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami kamavitakkam uppannapubbam”.
mn124:6.2: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati kamavitakkam uppannapubbam, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:7-8.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami byapadavitakkam …pe…
mn124:7-8.3: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati vihimsavitakkam uppannapubbam, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:9.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami gahapaticivaram sadita”.
mn124:9.2: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati gahapaticivaram sadita, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:10.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami satthena civaram chindita”.
mn124:10.2: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati satthena civaram chindita …pe… dharema”.
mn124:11-15.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami suciya civaram sibbita …pe…
mn124:20-25.2: nabhijanami matugamassa dhammam desita antamaso catuppadampi gatham …
mn124:37.1: “Asiti me, avuso, vassani pabbajitassa nabhijanami gamantasenasane vassam upaganta”.
mn124:37.2: “Yampayasma bakulo asitiya vassehi nabhijanati gamantasenasane vassam upaganta, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:38.1: “Sattahameva kho aham, avuso, sarano ratthapindam bhunjim;
mn124:38.3: Yampayasma bakulo sattahameva sarano ratthapindam bhunji; atha atthamiyam anna udapadi idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema.
mn124:39.1: Labheyyaham, avuso bakula, imasmim dhammavinaye pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
mn124:39.2: Alattha kho acelakassapo imasmim dhammavinaye pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
mn124:39.3: Acirupasampanno panayasma kassapo eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
mn124:39.4: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
mn124:39.5: Annataro kho panayasma kassapo arahatam ahosi.
mn124:40.1: Atha kho ayasma bakulo aparena samayena avapuranam adaya viharena viharam upasankamitva evamaha:
mn124:40.3: “Yampayasma bakulo avapuranam adaya viharena viharam upasankamitva evamaha: ‘abhikkamathayasmanto, abhikkamathayasmanto; ajja me parinibbanam bhavissati’ti, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”.
mn124:41.1: Ayasma bakulo majjhe bhikkhusanghassa nisinnakova parinibbayi.
mn124:41.2: “Yampayasma bakulo majjhe bhikkhusanghassa nisinnakova parinibbayi, idampi mayam ayasmato bakulassa acchariyam abbhutadhammam dharema”ti.
